description:
Madoka kicks her way through an apartment window in pursuit of Kazuhito. Natsuno`s true identity is revealed.
For Madoka, she is her brother`s killer--Akiyama Shinobu. Natsuno attempts to speak for Kazuhito and convey his thoughts, but Madoka takes Kazuhito in her arms and leaves through the window, escaping into the night.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koketsu ni Irazunba Inu o Ezu
虎穴に入らずんば犬を得ず
